document.heading: Rental Housing Act Extension Amendment Act of 2010

history.narrative: Law 18-328, the “Rental Housing Act Extension Amendment Act of 2010”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 18-864, which was referred to the Committee on Housing and Workforce Development. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 23, 2010, and December 7, 2010, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 7, 2010, it was assigned Act No. 18-650 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 18-328 became effective on March 12, 2011.
